thread.title: Reese Witherspoon, Mindy Kaling and Oprah Winfrey are having a blast in New Zealand
thread.title_full: Reese Witherspoon, Mindy Kaling and Oprah Winfrey are having a blast in New Zealand

author: April Hautea
title: Reese Witherspoon, Mindy Kaling and Oprah Winfrey are having a blast in New Zealand
text:
Reese Witherspoon plus Mindy Kaling plus Oprah Winfrey equal a trio too wonderful for words ‚Äî which is fine, because they've been sharing some pretty epic pictures on Instagram to prove the point.
SEE ALSO: Oprah is starring in an HBO movie, and the trailer alone will make you cry
The three actors are currently in New Zealand shooting the Disney film A Wrinkle in Time , based on the beloved children's novel by Madeleine L'Engle.
The cast members have been taking time during filming to share photographs of the majestic New Zealand landscapes and to show us the beauty of female friendship.
This is what I see on the the ride to work every morning. crystal blue Lake Hawea. #ilovenewzealand #WrinkleinTime
A post shared by Oprah (@oprah) on Feb 16, 2017 at 7:19pm PST
Couldn't be more excited to discover #NewZealand with this lady!!! üòúüèîüíö @mindykaling
A post shared by Reese Witherspoon (@reesewitherspoon) on Feb 16, 2017 at 11:12am PST
A post shared by Mindy Kaling (@mindykaling) on Feb 17, 2017 at 10:39pm PST
They've also been making the most of their time off work to enjoy the best the country has to offer.
Witherspoon shared a picture of herself exploring New Zealand's wine country.
Happy Sunday! ‚òÄÔ∏èsoaking up the sun in gorgeous #newzealand üá≥üáø Hope you are having a beautiful day!
A post shared by Reese Witherspoon (@reesewitherspoon) on Feb 18, 2017 at 11:39pm PST
Kaling gave us major envy with this picture of her taking a dip in an outdoor hot tub with a stunning view.
Hot tub wine machine with @cindy_j_williams
A post shared by Mindy Kaling (@mindykaling) on Feb 17, 2017 at 10:41pm PST
From the looks of the women's Instagram feeds, the film is sure to look breathtaking.
We also can't wait to see them together on screen. If their chemistry in the photographs is any indication, then we're in for a treat.
Hangin' with @reesewitherspoon ,@mindykaling the Mrs's from Wrinkle in Time, sending ‚ù§Ô∏è your way Valentines. #happyvalentinesday
A post shared by Oprah (@oprah) on Feb 14, 2017 at 8:04am PST
BONUS: National Geographic's 'Origins' is like 'Cosmos' but about the nature of human civilization
